channel.title: CVE Feed for Dnesscarkey -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Dnesscarkey -- all products

item.title: CVE-2022-27851|2024-08-03T05:41:10.197Z -- dnesscarkey -- use%20any%20font%20%7C%20custom%20font%20uploader%20%28wordpress%20plugin%29
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) in Use Any Font (WordPress plugin) <= 6.1.7 allows an attacker to deactivate the API key.

item.title: CVE-2024-29091|2024-06-04T17:58:17.317Z -- dnesscarkey -- wp%20armour%20%E2%80%93%20honeypot%20anti%20spam
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Dnesscarkey WP Armour – Honeypot Anti Spam allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects WP Armour – Honeypot Anti Spam: from n/a through 2.1.13.

item.title: CVE-2024-29091|2024-08-02T01:03:51.742Z -- dnesscarkey -- wp%20armour%20%E2%80%93%20honeypot%20anti%20spam
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Dnesscarkey WP Armour – Honeypot Anti Spam allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects WP Armour – Honeypot Anti Spam: from n/a through 2.1.13.
